question: I earn a little too much to qualify for Medicaid, and I don’t have health coverage through my job. What are my options?
text:
I earn a little too much to qualify for Medicaid, and I dont have health coverage through my job. What are my options?
          
        
Thats where Pennie comes in! If you received a notice indicating that you are not eligible for Medical Assistance, or you have been denied in the past based on your income, and you dont have coverage through your job, you may qualify for financial assistance to help lower the cost of health coverage and care through Pennie.
There are many details to consider and every applicant has their own set of unique needs and circumstances. Buying health coverage through Pennie is not one-size-fits-all and were here to help. The best way we can serve you is to have you create an account on pennie.com and submit an application for enrollment. We will work with you every step of the way to determine what coverage best meets your needs.
A Pennie Customer Service Representative can help with guidance and direction as well as application support by calling 1-844-844-8040. You can also find local help available in your area on 
pennie.com
.
